Parameter.name: parameter.count
Parameter.description: sets the global default for the count parameter to 10

Parameter.name: content.parameter.count
Parameter.description: Overrides the default for the content group of API’s

Parameter.name: content.list.parameter.count
Parameter.description: Overrides the default for the content list group of API’s

Parameter.name: filter.adults
Parameter.description: sets the global default for the adult parameter

Parameter.name: NDS_Console.plugins
Parameter.description: Plugin Order for modules as loaded in NDS Console

Parameter.name: tms.delivery.message.remotedata.retriever
Parameter.description: The details of remote data retriever fro retrieving device and household info.The '{householdId}' and {deviceId} token in the parameter's value will be replaced with the real Id being processed.

Parameter.name: tms.delivery.message.remotedata.retriever
Parameter.description: The details of remote data retriever fro retrieving device and household info.The '{householdId}' and {deviceId} token in the parameter's value will be replaced with the real Id being processed.

Parameter.name: itvts.idm.applicationProfile
Parameter.description: MiddlewareVersions for an application profile that can run this application.

Parameter.name: itvts.icd.pait.profile
Parameter.description: Multiple pait profiles that are supported

StructureMemberDefinition.description: Indicates whether or not the card supports SBM feature
StructureMemberDefinition.name: supportSbm

StructureMemberDefinition.description: Indicates the maximum number of SBM blocks available
StructureMemberDefinition.name: maxSbmBlocks

StructureMemberDefinition.description: Indicates the MSB per SBM block
StructureMemberDefinition.name: sbmMSB

StructureMemberDefinition.description: Indicates the maximum number of personal region areas
StructureMemberDefinition.name: maxRegions

StructureMemberDefinition.description: The initial card counter loaded upon card and serialization data loading
StructureMemberDefinition.name: initialCounter

StructureMemberDefinition.description: The maximum number of title-OPPV authorizations allowed for a single smart card
StructureMemberDefinition.name: maxNumOfOPPVs

Parameter.description: RMI Client TMS Messages Storage setting
Parameter.name: tms.storage.messages.rmi
service.queue.connections
Parameter.description: Connection identifier for queue server(s). For HornetQ this is the connection to HornetQ's jndi service.

Parameter.name: tms.tmm.behavior
Parameter.description: Definition of behavior of message source for sending messages through TMS

Parameter.name: tms.tmm.rmiNotificatorOnDemandServer2
Parameter.description: settings for the secondary ODS (when applicable)

StructureMemberDefinition.name: languages
StructureMemberDefinition.description: List of supported languages, sorted by priorities

StructureMemberDefinition.name: timezoneInfo.localTimeOffset
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The time offset including the offset polarity, example +02:00

StructureMemberDefinition.name: timezoneInfo.timeOfChange
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The date and time in MJD and UTC when the next time change will take place, example 2012-03-30T02:00:00

StructureMemberDefinition.name: timezoneInfo.nextTimeOffset
StructureMemberDefinition.description: The next time offset time after the change including the offset polarity, example +01:00
